name: The Trollier Problem
description: This bandit is quite ambitious. He has tied fifty people to one track, and a single person to the other. One one has to die, for fifty to live. Surely, the choice is obvious. Then again, you'd have to condemn the one.

options.name: Human-Dense Track
options.description: This track has fifty humans tied to it. Ten neat bodies all in a row. Surely that's a large enough number for a single to die for? They might even thank you.

options.name: Human-Sparce Track
options.description: A single human is tied to the track. Just one. A single life, that's all. Not a doctor, or painter. Just a single human. What are they worth to you?
